plugins/rfxcom/plugin_info/configuration.Enregistrer tous les messages, cela peut: Record all messages. This can slow down the system (requires a restart of the RFXCOM daemon)

plugins/rfxcom/desktop/modal/show.debug..Attention le lancement en mode debug est: Warning: Running in debug mode uses resources and generates logs. Remember to restart the daemon in normal mode when you are done.

plugins/rfxcom/desktop/modal/show.log.ph.Pensez bien à activer l'écriture de tous: Remember to enable writing of all messages in the plugin settings and to restart the daemon when that is done (Don't forget to disable everything when you are finished)
